email_text:
Subject: Urgent: Apply for COVID-19 Relief Funds Today

Dear [Recipient],

We are reaching out to inform you about the latest COVID-19 relief funds being offered by the government to individuals and businesses affected by the ongoing pandemic. As a government agency dedicated to providing support during these challenging times, we are here to assist you in accessing the financial assistance you need.

To apply for the relief funds, we kindly ask that you fill out the attached form with accurate information regarding your current financial situation and how COVID-19 has impacted you or your business. This form will help us evaluate your eligibility for the relief funds and ensure that the funds are distributed to those who need them the most.

Please note that the deadline for submitting the form is [date], so we encourage you to act quickly and submit your application as soon as possible. Our goal is to provide swift and efficient assistance to all those in need, and we appreciate your cooperation in this process.

If you have any questions or require assistance with filling out the form, please do not hesitate to contact us at [phone number] or [email address]. We are here to help and support you through this difficult time.

Thank you for your attention to this matter, and we look forward to receiving your completed form.

Sincerely,

[Government Agency Name]
